title: Java Level 6 — Methods & Basic OOP
concept: Defining methods, simple classes, encapsulation basics.

challenges.name: GCD of Two Numbers
challenges.description: Write a method gcd(a, b) that returns greatest common divisor using Euclidean algorithm and use it in main.

challenges.name: Is Prime Method
challenges.description: Write a method isPrime(n) that returns true if n is prime, else false. In main, print YES or NO.

challenges.name: Sum of Array (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method sumArray(int[] a) that returns sum of elements. Use it after reading input.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.name: Rectangle Class
challenges.description: Create a class Rectangle with fields width and height (int), constructor, and method area() returning width*height. Read w,h, create object, print area().

challenges.name: Circle Class
challenges.description: Create Circle class with radius (double) and method getArea() using π=3.14. Read radius, create object, print area with 2 decimals.

challenges.name: Student Class
challenges.description: Define Student with fields name (String), age (int). Read name and age, create object and print "Name: <name>, Age: <age>".
challenges.input_format: First line: name. Second line: age.

challenges.name: Overloaded Sum Methods
challenges.description: Create overloaded methods sum(int a, int b) and sum(int a, int b, int c). Read 2 or 3 numbers; if input has 2 numbers print sum of two; if 3 print sum of three.
challenges.input_format: First integer k (2 or 3). Next k integers.

challenges.name: Static Utility Method: isPalindrome
challenges.description: Write a static method isPalindrome(String s) that checks if s is palindrome. Read s, print YES or NO.

challenges.name: Temperature Converter Class
challenges.description: Create class TempConverter with static methods toCelsius(double f) and toFahrenheit(double c). Read an integer t and value x. If t=1 convert F->C, if t=2 convert C->F. Print with 2 decimals.
challenges.input_format: First line: t (1 or 2). Second line: double x.

challenges.name: Bank Account Class
challenges.description: Create BankAccount class with fields owner (String) and balance (double), constructor, deposit(amount), withdraw(amount) (no negative balance check). Read owner, initial balance, then an integer q operations of type D amount or W amount. After all operations print final balance with 2 decimals.
challenges.input_format: Line1: owner (string no spaces). Line2: double balance. Line3: int q. Next q lines: operation: 'D x' or 'W x'.
